tickets.subject: Fwd: Mail - marivic@sfrealtors.com
tickets.description:
Thx for anyone’s help.  I received this and the sender is home ill -she can’t send in different format.  I need the attached schedule quickly for my CAR meetings.  Mimecast has grabbed the attachment, forces me out to another version of Outlook, and then no attachment is there  to retrieve.  I’ve tried multiple times and I’m still stuck in CAR meetings in Sacto w only iPhone.   Can you try to download and send back to me in normal format?
Thx!!
Rick

Rick Turley
Vice President/Managing Broker
Alain Pinel Realtors
San Francisco Offices
2017 SFAR Manager's Council Chair
California Association of Realtors Director
Tel/text 415-577-5538

Subject: Mail - marivic@sfrealtors.com<mailto:marivic@sfrealtors.com>

Thanks for your well wishes.

https://outlook.office.com/owa/?realm=sfrealtors.com&exsvurl=1&ll-cc=1033&modurl=0&path=/attachmentlightbox

Sent: Wednesday, May 2, 2018 3:46 PM
To: Dana Van Hulsen <dvanhulsen@apr.com>
Subject: Your PayPal account is limited until we hear from you.

 

 

Confirm your mailing address

 

We were unable to verify your contact address you set up on your last transaction. Did you change/update your contact address. If you did please confirm this action now.

Take a minute to confirm this address so we know it belongs to you. Once you confirm it, you can use this email address to receive notifications and updates concerning your details.

 

 

It's important because it helps us make sure no one is getting into your space without your knowledge.

Sincerely,
Customer Support.

 

This email was sent by an automated system, so if you reply, nobody will see it. To get in touch with us, log in to your account and click "Contact Us" at the bottom of any page.

tickets.subject: Pat Cox - Missing Open House Info on apr.com - 2486 Alamo Country Cir - 40819027
tickets.raw_subject: Pat Cox - Missing Open House Info on apr.com - 2486 Alamo Country Cir - 40819027
tickets.description:
Good Morning,

 

Pat Cox checked on her listing for 2486 Alamo Country Circle on Zillow and it is not showing her open house or property.

 

Her open house and property is showing on Realtor.com, Trulia, and Redfin, but not Zillow.

 

Pat’s client is very upset because other properties on that site are showing there open houses.

 

Thank you in advance for your help in this matter.

 

May Taliaferro-Bell

OFFICE ADMINISTRATOR

Alain Pinel Realtors (http://www.apr.com/) ®

601 Sycamore Valley Rd West

Danville, CA 94526

D 925.791.2612 | O 925.314.1111

Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/alainpinelrealtors)  | apr.com (http://www.apr.com/)
